pages.text: $(italic)In the meantime, you have come into possession of many new materials. It's time to take a close look at each of them to see what effect they have on your Potions.$(br2)Your educated guess, as an expert: Awesome!

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Instead of Blaze Powder, the Potion Workshop runs on Mermaid's Gems. Main advantage is that you don't have to fill your bottles with water before.
